title: Feynman 1998 Excerpt from The Meaning of It All

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Feynman makes to convey his message about science and its relation to the greater world.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Feynman makes to convey his message about science and its relation to the greater world.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
